TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: How dare you do this to me?

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Fine, if you really need me.
Don't read too much into it!
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Fine! Get out of here, idiot!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: What can I do for you?
Can I just finish this fast?
Go for it! You can do it!
You can't help but watch us?
If you keep staring like that...
Seems like this is your style.
How is it? Does it match?
That girl... May I see her?
This is going to be fun, right?
Should I look forward to this?
I don't know if I can do this.
I'm not used to this dress...
It's good to take a break.
I just wipe them out, right?
Food. Are you giving or not?
I said I'm not a child anymore!
I must ask you to leave!
Don't take this the wrong way!
I don't like you or anything!
Ah? Want to play a game?
What do I need to do?
It would be good to rest...
Did you want to walk with me?
It's all going just as planned.
Ooh... When can I grow up?
So, what do you want to do?
I heard there's a fun place
Hm? How can I help you?
A full moon, blood, and prey...
Why should I even be here?
This is a lovely blue world.
This world is full of sunlight.
Let me rest a little longer.
I'll show you a witch's power.
난 좀 빼 줘. 나 서장이야.
This is quite the war machine.

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Are we calling it a day?
Call me if you need me.
TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: Who do you think I am?

TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: My broom and I are one!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: I've got to see for myself.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Next time, make it more fun.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: I'll do my best to help you.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Will you be fine without me?

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: You've got an eye for talent.
Of course I'll be a huge help.
Ah... I won't let you down.
I get to wipe them out, right?
TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: I love your pain! Do you?
TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: I don't take pain. I give it!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: I don't know, but I'll try...

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Let's go out again next time.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: How about a cup of tea?
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I hope we can meet again.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: If you need me, I'll help.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I'm a little tired. Let's rest.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: My sword is pointing at you.

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Ah, I had a wonderful time.
Bye bye! See you next time!
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: Are you going easy on me?
Is this the door of truth?

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: If the pay is good, I'll do it.
Are you okay? You look pale.
Huh... You look healthy to me.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Drop by any time you want.
Feel free to call me again.
TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: The cost of blood is high.

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: For this kind of thing, anytime...
But there's still food to try!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: I like this kind of thing, okay?
I'm going to need more pay.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Can you take off the glasses?

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: I can handle this by myself.
Senpai... You can't put that in.
TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: Don't just plant that flag anywhere!

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I only learned from Ms. Kris!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: What do you want to know?
TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: It doesn't matter if you believe or not.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: If you want to die, I can't help you.

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: If you tell anyone, I'll kill you.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: You won't even be a memory!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: So much good wine in Crux.
TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: That's right. Drink it right down.

TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: If you know nothing of Sita, then you're useless.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Don't rest! Get to work! Now!
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Really... I have to be there.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: Do you even need my help for this?

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: It's a pleasure to meet you.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I miss them... Just a bit.
Sometimes, I just need a nap.
TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: Was it you who woke me up?

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: I worry for the young ones.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I can't waste my time here.

TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: I wonder if I can enjoy the event...
This might be a little cold.

TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: I knew I couldn't trust Pintail.
I'll take my anger out on you!
Don't look so pleased with yourself.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: Allow me to change your fate.

TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: This is the price of heads!
TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: This is the price of tails!

TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: This is how you do it!

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Too bad. I was almost there.
Just tell me when and where.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: Time to pound on the leader!
Sorry. This will only hurt a bit.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Do you want a ride too?
TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: Do you know who I am?!
You've got a long way to go!

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: What gift do I eat first?

TALK_PATTERN.ATTACK: This herring will cut you down.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: Does it hurt? How about now?

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: The bamboo is a bit much...
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: No! I refuse to read that line!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Why couldn't it be a bear!
I-I'm not much to look at...
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Being in front of crowds is...

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Why am I a cuddly rabbit?!
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I-It's not that I hated it...
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: You're a... Ugh. Hare too slow.

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Too bad, but I won't give up.
I don't want to go again!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: It's a pain! I hate it!

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: If I can find something better...

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Can I do what I want?
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: Even a temporary advisor can't be ignored.

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I thought I'd freeze to death...
TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: Of all places, you had to hit there...

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: I still have a mission to do.
I don't want to rest yet!
I still have much left to do!

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: If it's too easy, you owe me.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: It was fun. See you later.
TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: Give me a little more fun.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: How pitiful. Is this all you have?

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: I need the Penguin of Destiny.
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: It's a difference of opinion, then.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Come with me to the ending.
Do you need power as well?
If I must... Nice to meet you.
TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: Let me be alone for a while.
I cannot help you any further.

TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: Even the sage is a mere child to me.

TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: 더 이상 시간을 보낼 수는 없어.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: 삼라만상의 이치와 맞지 않는 책들 뿐
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: 세상은 아직 내가 알아야 할 게 더 있는건가

TALK_PATTERN.COUNTER: 이 정도에 나의 응원력은 줄어들지 않아!
더 이상 시간을 보낼 수는 없어.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: 내가 섬기는 분은 단 한 분이야.

TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: The fastest way to the heart is through the ribcage.

TALK_PATTERN.JOIN: Training for the body and soul.

TALK_PATTERN.FALL_APART: When will the next game be?
TALK_PATTERN.DIRECT: At this rate, this game will be mine!
